name: Dynamic Effort Method – Upper Body (~10 min)
overview_and_execution: Perform 9×3 of fast, explosive bench presses at ~50-60% 1RM plus bands/chains. Rest 30-60s between sets, focusing on maximal bar speed.
example_application: Bench Press: 9×3 @ 50% + 25% band tension, 45s rest each. 3-week wave: 50-55-60%.
important_notes: Keep the weight submaximal; velocity is key. If bar speed slows, slightly increase rest or reduce load.
